Governor Hochul is Delivering Results for New Yorkers

From the day Governor Hochul took office, her commitment to every New Yorker has been simple: “your family is my fight." In her inaugural address, she laid out a clear vision: make New York more affordable, safer, and fairer for every family. She pledged to take on the state’s toughest challenges head-on and invest in what makes New York, New York. Over four years later, Governor Hochul has delivered on that promise, putting money back in New Yorkers' pockets, keeping communities safe, defending fundamental rights from Washington's attacks, and fighting for hardworking families. And she’s just getting started.

  • Shootings down 60% statewide

  • 814,000 private sector jobs created

  • Expanded the child tax credit for 2.75 million kids

  • More than 10,000 illegal guns off NY's streets

  • Retail theft down 14%

  • NYC subway crimes at record lows

  • Over $3 billion invested in public safety and law enforcement

  • Advanced Second Avenue Subway and the Interborough Express

  • Secured the largest private investment in state history

  • Statewide bell-to-bell phone ban

  • Increased the minimum wage and tied it to inflation

  • 70,000 units of housing built or preserved

  • 2.5 Million Free Meals per School Day Statewide

  • $7.6 billion investment in childcare over four years

  • 170,000 child care seats capped at $15 per week

  • Delivered $1.4 billion in energy savings

  • Developed nuclear power plan for up to 1 million homes & businesses

  • Implemented the nation's first congestion pricing program
